Name: Spiced Pear
Ingredients: 25 ml Belle de Brillet pear liqueur
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Garnish with pear wedge on rim.
Review: Just as it says on the tin - spiced pear.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2002 by James Stuart-Gammie in Edinburgh, Scotland.
Nutrition: One serving of Spiced Pear contains 161 calories
